item.title: [snc] Gala Greeters
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Alliance—Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn—

• Put a +1/+1 counter on Gala Greeters.

• Create a tapped Treasure token.

• You gain 2 life.

item.title: [snc] Incriminate
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. That player sacrifices one of them.

item.title: [snc] Light 'Em Up
item.description:
Sorcery

Casualty 2 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.)

Light 'Em Up deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [snc] Courier's Briefcase
item.description:
Artifact — Treasure

When Courier's Briefcase enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.

{T}, Sacrifice Courier's Briefcase: Add one mana of any color.

{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Courier's Briefcase: Draw three cards.

item.title: [snc] Courier's Briefcase
item.description:
Artifact — Treasure

When Courier's Briefcase enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.

{T}, Sacrifice Courier's Briefcase: Add one mana of any color.

{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Courier's Briefcase: Draw three cards.

item.title: [snc] Nimble Larcenist
item.description:
Creature — Bird Rogue

Flying

When Nimble Larcenist enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an artifact, instant, or sorcery c ard from it and exile that card.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/behind-scenes-streets-new-capennas-stylish-booster-fun-2022-04-07

item.title: [snc] Jaxis, the Troublemaker
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a token that's a copy of another target creature you control. It gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.

Blitz {1}{R} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/streets-of-new-capenna-mechanics-2022-04-07

item.title: [snc] Disciplined Duelist
item.description:
Creature — Human Citizen

Double strike

Discipliend Duelist enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/streets-of-new-capenna-mechanics-2022-04-07

item.title: [snc] Wiretapping
item.description:
Enchantment

Hideaway 5 (When this enchantment enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

Whenever you draw your first card during each of your draw steps, draw a card. Then if you have nine or more cards in hand, you may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/streets-of-new-capenna-mechanics-2022-04-07

item.title: [snc] Devilish Valet
item.description:
Creature — Devil Warrior

Trample, haste

Alliance — Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, double Devilish Valet's power until end of turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/streets-of-new-capenna-mechanics-2022-04-07

item.title: [snc] Botanical Plaza
item.description:
Land

Botanical Plaza enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

{2}{G}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Botanical Plaza: Draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Mountain
item.description:
Basic Land — Mountain

({T}: Add {R}.)

item.title: [sld] Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Angel Horror

Flying, vigilance, deathtouch, lifelink

At the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [sld] Breya, Etherium Shaper
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Human

When Breya, Etherium Shaper enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

{2}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Choose one —

• Breya deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

• Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

• You gain 5 life.

item.title: [sld] Yidris, Maelstrom Wielder
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Ogre Wizard

Trample

Whenever Yidris, Maelstrom Wielder deals combat damage to a player, as you cast spells from your hand this turn, they gain cascade. (When you cast the spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

item.title: [sld] Glacial Fortress
item.description:
Land

Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.

{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

item.title: [sld] Rootbound Crag
item.description:
Land

Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.

{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

item.title: [sld] Drowned Catacomb
item.description:
Land

Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

item.title: [sld] Dragonskull Summit
item.description:
Land

Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

item.title: [sld] Sunpetal Grove
item.description:
Land

Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

item.title: [sld] Mother of Runes
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

{T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Death's Shadow
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add {G}.

item.title: [sld] Concordant Crossroads
item.description:
World Enchantment

All creatures have haste.

item.title: [sld] Nomad Outpost
item.description:
Land

Nomad Outpost enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.

item.title: [sld] Ghost Quarter
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}, Sacrifice Ghost Quarter: Destroy target land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [sld] Sram, Senior Edificer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Advisor

Whenever you cast an Aura, Equipment, or Vehicle spell, draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Balthor the Defiled
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Dwarf

Minion creatures get +1/+1.

{B}{B}{B}, Exile Balthor the Defiled: Each player returns all black and all red creature cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [sld] Torbran, Thane of Red Fell
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Noble

If a red source you control would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals that much damage plus 2 instead.

item.title: [sld] Depala, Pilot Exemplar
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Pilot

Other Dwarves you control get +1/+1.

Each Vehicle you control gets +1/+1 as long as it's a creature.

Whenever Depala, Pilot Exemplar becomes tapped, you may pay {X}. If you do, reveal the top X cards of your library, put all Dwarf and Vehicle cards from among them into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [sld] Goblin Settler
item.description:
Creature — Goblin

When Goblin Settler enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

item.title: [sld] Collector Ouphe
item.description:
Creature — Ouphe

Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.

item.title: [sld] Vengevine
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Haste

Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return Vengevine from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [sld] Void Winnower
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi

Your opponents can't cast spells with even mana values. (Zero is even.)

Your opponents can't block with creatures with even mana values.

item.title: [afr] A-Dwarfhold Champion
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Warrior

Ward {1}

As long as Dwarfhold Champion is equipped, it gets +0/+2.

item.title: [afr] A-Armory Veteran
item.description:
Creature — Orc Warrior

Ward — Pay 2 life.

As long as Armory Veteran is equipped, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [afr] A-Bruenor Battlehammer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dwarf Warrior

Each creature you control gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.

{1}: Attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

item.title: [znr] A-Kargan Intimidator
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Cowards can't block Warriors.

{1}: Choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn —

• Kargan Intimidator gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

• Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn.

item.title: [znr] A-Goma Fada Vanguard
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever Goma Fada Vanguard attacks, target creature an opponent controls with power less than or equal to the number of Warriors and Equipment you control can't block this turn.
